root.name: MLB Dugout Heroes
root.description: Includes a slimmed down roster of each major league team in the 2009 season (excluding trades during)Teams' pitching staffs include 4 starting and 3 relief pitchers.Teams' get a total of 13 fielders, with a DH for both American and National league teamsIncludes a leveling system for both the team profile and individual playersMicro transactions available on main site and in game for player cards and items using CC (Campus Credits)There are also player cards and items available using the game's currency NUTSPlayers age: Once used in a game players begin their 8 season career. Seasons consist of 50 completed games, no matter the length (3, 5, 7 or 9 innings)
